body:
I have nearly hit 500 subscribers on my YouTube channel! To celebrate that, as part of my special video I want to do an AMA/QnA!

So go ahead and ask me anything!

P.S - Subbing to my channel is optional and will make this video come quicker! Totally not bribing anyone :)

P.P.S - I don't want to do only an AMA/QnA, so what are some ideas that I could do in the same video?

EDIT: I will answer all the questions in the video and not on the forums!
body_tagged:

EDIT: I will answer all the questions in the video and not on the forums!
title: 500 Subscriber AMA!!!
